name: CONAN: The Eight Stouts
description:
So, every few months I get a Conan kick and end up binging a lot of his remotes. One of my favorites is when he plays horror games. A good friend of mine also enjoys him, so I suggested I make a Slender clone but replace Slender with Conan. It's got multiple references to a bunch of the remotes. This was over a year ago, and I wanted to release it during October of 2021, but it never came to fruition. Even now, over a year later, it's not done. The project file is sitting on a hard drive in my closet somewhere. I'm not going to dig around for it, at least not now, so this version is the almost completed version. Anyway I figured it's better to release this regardless, since art not shared is wasted. And it might be presumptuous of me to call this "art" since it really is just a joke, but I hope you enjoy anyway.

Similar to the original Slender, your goal is to collect 8 stouts and avoid Conan.

CONTROLS

W A S D
MoveLeft Click
Pick Up
Right Click
Toggle Flashlight
Left Shift
Run

THIS GAME IS NOT AFFILIATED WITH CONAN IN ANY WAY
